target_title: Density-aware NeRF Ensembles: Quantifying Predictive Uncertainty in Neural Radiance Fields
target_caption: TABLE I: Measuring uncertainty quantification with Negative Log Likelihood (NLL) for baselines and different ensemble sizes of our proposed method.Considered baselines are Monte Carlo Dropout (MC-DO), a naive ensembles approach implemented by [20], NeRF in the Wild (NeRF-W) [29], S-NeRF [20], and CF-NeRF [21]. The latter paper only published average NLL over all scenes instead of individual results. A \dagger indicates results taken from [20], \ddagger from [21].
source_title: Stochastic neural radiance fields: Quantifying uncertainty in implicit 3d representations
